author: elecharny
msg: Used the correct method instead of toString() which is semantically speakin, wrong

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-758.  Fix exception handling during reduce so that root exceptions are not masked by exceptions in cleanups.  Contributed by Raghu.

author: pmcmahan
msg: - remove support for 2.0-M1-SNAPSHOT since the configs published
in the snapshot repo are incompatible with those assemblies
- make use of <obsolete> for catalg entries so that the plugin
installer will remove the old module when it installs the newer
version from the snapshot repo (effectively performing an upgrade)
